headline.main: Link of Smoking and Heart Disease Reported

keywords.value: JOURNAL OF THE AMERICAN MEDICAL ASSN
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Heart disease patients who smoke are three times more likely to have chest pains and restricted blood flow to their hearts than those who do not, researchers say in a new study.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Heart disease patients who smoke are three times more likely to have chest pains and restricted blood flow to their hearts than those who do not, researchers say in a new study.
